casebody.data:
Georgia D. RUSSELL
v.
Larry RUSSELL. No. 325P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 23, 2006. Cedric R. Perry, Rocky Mount, for Georgia D. Russell. Wesley Abney, for Larry Russell.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of June 2006 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd day of October 2006."
